attributes.action: consider jail sentences only for criminal acts. Offer better advice to the judiciary on imprison British citizens fr non - violent offences, only if they are found guilty of committing a criminal act as a solution to address over crowding - jail crowds shouldn't be allowed !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sounds crazy, doesn't it ?! The petitioner is calling on the British govt,. to address it's self - created human rights abuses in prisons : Prisoners are being forced to sleep in toilets due to overcrowding, AOL today reports.

The purpose of any supervisory practice is to ensure poor practice isn't occurring - not to just to report when it is ! This kind of lack of concern for citizens is what causes revolts inside prisons and revolutions outside - calling for people in govt. out ! In out, in out, shake it all about is not a consistent means of administratiion for govt. or the society whose needs are meant to be served.
